snippet: A federal judge on Monday overturned one conviction against Maureen McDonnell, the former Virginia first lady, but affirmed several other corruption verdicts against her and her husband, former Gov. Bob McDonnell.
abstract: Federal judge overturns one conviction against Maureen McDonnell, former Virginia first lady, but affirms several other corruption verdicts against her and her husband, former Gov Bob McDonnell.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Monday overturned one conviction against Maureen McDonnell, the former Virginia first lady, but affirmed several other corruption verdicts against her and her husband, former Gov. Bob McDonnell.

headline.main: Virginia: Ex-Governor’s Wife Cleared on One Count
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Ex-Governor’s Wife Cleared on One Count
